alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 1:28AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Talladega and Calhoun Counties through 215 AM CST... At 128 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rainbow City to near Pell City to near Westover. Movement was east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anniston, Oxford, Talladega, Jacksonville, Piedmont, West End-Cobb Town, Cobb Town, Fort McClellan, Saks, Lincoln, Glencoe, Weaver, Riverside, Vincent, Munford, Ohatchee, Hobson City, Waldo, Alpine Bay Resort and Talladega Superspeedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for central Alabama.
